title: Highly diversified portfolios
description: As loans are de-risked over a network, lenders benefit from a diversified basket of smaller loans.

title: Strong repayment mechanism
description: As borrower's supporters are most heavily exposed to a loan, there are significant social barriers to defaulting.

title: Optimised interest rates
description: Our framework can be configured to provide the best possible interest rates for either borrowers or lenders, depending on context.

title: Works without traditional risk data
description: Formalising lending based on societal trust enables the financial inclusion of those marginalised by traditional risk models.

title: Enables credit identity
description: Formalizing informal lending behaviour enables creation of credit identity for borrowers excluded by traditional financial institutions.

title: Very low transaction costs
description: Algorithmic underwriting and DLT-enabled disbursal and collection processes ensure minuscule transaction costs.
